translations: n．刺绣工，刺绣师：从事刺绣工作的人。
· The embroiderers are working on a beautiful tapestry.
刺绣师们正在制作一幅美丽的挂毯。

sentences.sentence: By the 1970s, Sichuan had as many as 5,000 embroiderers.
sentences.translation: 20世纪70年代，四川有多达5000名刺绣师傅。

sentences.sentence: She has worked with local embroiderers to replicate parts of her paintings in intricate embroidery, which in turn she interpolates within her own drawings.
sentences.translation: 她曾与当地的刺绣工一起工作，将她的一部分绘画作品复制到复杂的刺绣品上，然后依次将刺绣品添加到她自己的绘画当中。

sentences.sentence: This file type is the most commonly file used by professional printers and embroiderers etc. They will be able to reduce and increase the size of the image without any loss of quality.
sentences.translation: 这个文件类型是最常见的文件由打印机和刺绣等专业使用，它们将能减少和增加没有任何质量损失的图像的大小。
